Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

Avacados
Kosher Salt
Lime
Red Onion and wash
Serrano Chillis and wash
Cilantros and wash
Black Pepper
Roma Tomato and wash
Scallion and wash

Vegan Recipe

Cut Avacados and place in glass bowl
Put ¾ cup tsps Kosher Salt in bowl
Mash avacado with fork
Mince 0.66 cups Red Onion and put in bowl
Mince Serrano Chillis and put in bowl
Chop Scallion and put in bowl
Mince and deseed and depulp Roma Tomato and put in bowl
Put 2 tbsps Cilantros in bowl
Squeeze Lime into bowl
Put ¼ cup tsps Black Pepper
Stir bowl
